page.title: 11NEW BUILDING IN HEREFORD.
page.content: There is much building in Hereford at the moment{Housing estates }are being built on the outskirts of town at Bobblestock,Tupsley and Kings Acre.The houses are nearly all semi-detached or detached,there are no high-rise flats. There are also{commercial developments both in the town centre and near housing estates.These include a hypermarket called Tesco,a supermarket called Leo's,McDonalds a fast food shop and an Early Learning Centre, which sells educational toys for infants.Two{multistorey car parks}are being built for shoppers. A Bingo Hall was closed and replaced by a Cinema. A new indoor{Sports Centre}is being built near to Hereford Race Course. There are other sites in the centre of town as yet not allocated.
